supportedTokens.name: Wrapped Tezos
supportedTokens.description: is a fully collateralized representation of XTZ conforming to the FA1.2 token standard

supportedTokens.name: tzBTC
supportedTokens.description: is a Tezos token which is fully collateralized with Bitcoin, issued by the Bitcoin Association Switzerland

supportedTokens.name: Kolibri
supportedTokens.description: is a Tezos based stablecoin built on Collateralized Debt Positions (CDPs)

supportedTokens.name: USDTez
supportedTokens.description: is a stable coin pegged to the value of the United States Dollar

supportedTokens.name: StakerDAO Token
supportedTokens.description: is the governance token for StakerDAO, is built on the FA 1.2 token standard on Tezos
